feedback:
Good application of DRIVER framework (demonstrated 3 stages). Consider strengthening the stages you didn't explicitly show.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student clearly identified a finance-specific workflow problem and implemented a working tool that accepts financial metrics (ARR, growth, margins, burn, churn) and produces investment memos, demonstrating the application functions as a financial app. Evidence from both Discover and Implement stages shows problem framing and a functioning solution.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Integrate AI: The submission clearly integrates AI into a concrete tool and demonstrates value (automating memo drafting), fulfilling basic integration requirements. However, it lacks depth on how the AI is implemented, validated, or any technical/operational details, so it meets the criterion only at a basic/partial level rather than a thorough PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: ["So, for my Capstone project, I built a private equity analyst AI tool."]
["In the real world, private equity associates spend hours taking raw data from companies and formatting it into investment memos."]
["this tool, drafts, you know, an executive summary for us instantly, which saves, you know, private equity firms a ton of time from drafting these memos."]
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover (identified the real-world problem of formatting raw company data into memos) and Implement (built and demonstrated an AI tool that ingests financial inputs and generates investment memos).
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly identified a finance-specific workflow problem and implemented a working tool that accepts financial metrics (ARR, growth, margins, burn, churn) and produces investment memos, demonstrating the application functions as a financial app. Evidence from both Discover and Implement stages shows problem framing and a functioning solution.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So, for my Capstone project, I built a private equity analyst AI tool."
"In the real world, private equity associates spend hours taking raw data from companies and formatting it into investment memos."
"this tool, drafts, you know, an executive summary for us instantly, which saves, you know, private equity firms a ton of time from drafting these memos."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — identified a real-world problem (associates spending hours formatting memos).  
Implement — built and demonstrated an AI tool that generates executive summaries from input data.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly integrates AI into a concrete tool and demonstrates value (automating memo drafting), fulfilling basic integration requirements. However, it lacks depth on how the AI is implemented, validated, or any technical/operational details, so it meets the criterion only at a basic/partial level rather than a thorough PASS.
